import { Grid } from '@mui/material' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import '../styles/NewRoutine.css' const NewRoutine = ({ API_URL, onShow, routine, setRoutine, sessions, edit }) => { const handleRoutine = (key, value) => { let updated = {...routine} updated[key] = value setRoutine(updated) } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('Envía') } return (
handleRoutine('name', e.target.value)} />
